sql.value: select a.id, a.ip_address, a.request_way, a.log_status, a.log_type, a.api_path, a.create_time, b. username, b.nickname from sys_log a left join sys_user b on (a.operator = b.id) where 1=1 #[and a.id = :id] #[and b.username like :operator] #[and b.nickname like :operator] order by a.id desc
